title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin has bad news for James Harden as the 76ers drop game 1 to the Heat and why they have no hope to win a title without Joel Embiid. He discusses the 6 game suspension for Cardinals WR DeAndre Hopkins and why Arizona will be just fine while he's out. He shares his top 10 teams in the NFL right now following free agency and the draft. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show in studio to debate Draymond Green's career and how he stacks up against the other all time greats. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
